> <OLD>
>
> It was all about self defense.  Tucson had learned that a hero never made
> the first blow and he was not about to do that now.  So with complete
> silence, poise, and focus, he closes his optics, stands perfectly straight,
> and drags his right foot across the ground in a slow semi circle in front of
> where he stands.  This blossoms into a graceful and fluid form of a
> meditative exercise similar to Tai Chi.  He implements his katana in the
> tranquil dance as a dew drop falls from a branch from a tree that hangs over
> him.  The drop lands on his sword but does not spatter.  It rolls in perfect
> form, over the blade, which is lowered to the ground as the dew drop lands
> perfectly intact to a fern leaf.  This maneuver was known as INNER PEACE.
> The most ancient tricks in the history of Kung Fu, which was also taught in
> Ninjabot training.  So as Tucson maneuvers once again, his sword braces for
> impact as he retains a highly meditative state.

<NEW>

So as TUSCON braced for impact, using his inner peace and kung Fu
balance the DINOBOTS do what they do best and use their might to their
advantage.

GRIMLOCK's sword comming in high, his arm flexing mightilly as he did
so. He swung up and over, bringing the business end of it straight
down the middle, using his weight as well as his skill and cunning to
his advantage. He cared nothing for the seeming balance that TUSCON
had maintained as he brought his blade down at TUSCON

At the same time SLAG's attack came from in through the middle from
the back as he thrust foward not allowing Maximal a chance to step
back or even move, his blade perfectly timed to coincide with
GRIMLOCK's attack as well as its angle.

And if that were not enough SLUDGE and SNARL were coming in from
either side, thier size and power making them both forces to be
reckoned with. With vicious attacks they sought to take a bite out of
TUSCON with razor sharp teeth!

This was a group who had fought together for centuries just like this,
in terrain much harsher than this. it was they who had fought their
way out of the darkness out of defeat, carving triumph out of loss.
They were the ones that even the combiner robots feared to face. When
it came to fight Unicron, they were the first ones sent in. They were
well trained, not by a master as TUSCON was, but by the sheer weight
of years, the number of victories, their skills, prowess and mindless
ferocity were unmatched! They acted, not as seperate individuals but
as one beast, each one acting in concert, always in a way that helped
the others to close the attack and to do as much damage as possible.

The more TUSCON would defend, the more they were close the attack, the
more he would step away, the more they would close. If he attacked one
then the others would use the opening to make the hit. If he attacked
more than one then others would close from the opposite side. What
they did was driven as much by skill as by instinct - they knew what
to do without even thinking about it. They were well armed and armored
and knew how to use them and they would not stop!

Claws, teeth, sword and laser cannon they were bringing them all to
bear on TUSCON and they had little care for what he said or did, their
only goal was to bring him down and to do it now!

The battle was begining in earnest now and his choice was to fight or flee!

(TAG)

Preston
